salaryExpectations: LKR 60,000 (Technician) to LKR 250,000+ (Foreman/Garage Owner) per month.
futureOutlook: The increasing number and complexity of vehicles on Sri Lankan roads create a massive, constant demand for skilled technicians. The biggest challenge and opportunity is the shift towards hybrid and electric vehicles (EVs). Technicians who invest in training for these new technologies will be in the highest demand and can command premium salaries.
